title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Fantom Faucet is an open platform for enthusiasts to claim free FTM on the testnet environment.It allows users to claim up to 5 FTM tokens every 5 minutes.Testnet FTM is mainly designed for testing purposes.That explains why Testnet FTM has no actual market value.Please keep in mind that test token in general and Testnet FTM in specific cannot be transferred to the mainnet in anyways.Learn more about Fantom Faucet in our article.
